enhanced_objects.name: pumpkin
enhanced_objects.artistic_description: A plump pumpkin rendered with loose, visible brushstrokes in warm ochre and deep orange, its surface catching the afternoon light with soft, diffused highlights. The matte rind shows subtle variations of amber and burnt sienna, with gentle shadows pooling in the natural ridges.

enhanced_objects.name: couch
enhanced_objects.artistic_description: A miniature couch painted with soft, blended strokes in dusty rose and pale cream, its fabric surface absorbing the natural light with a gentle matte finish. The cushions show subtle tonal shifts of mauve and warm gray, creating a velvety, inviting texture.

enhanced_objects.name: tennis racket
enhanced_objects.artistic_description: A toy racket captured with quick, energetic strokes of glossy white and muted silver, its frame reflecting sharp highlights from the bright interior light. The taut strings appear as delicate crosshatching in pale gray, contrasting with the warm wooden handle painted in honey tones.

enhanced_objects.name: vase
enhanced_objects.artistic_description: A small vase rendered in translucent cerulean and soft teal, its ceramic surface catching scattered light with delicate, shimmering highlights. The glaze shows subtle pooling of deeper blue in the crevices, creating a watery, luminous effect against the bright atmosphere.

enhanced_objects.name: sink
enhanced_objects.artistic_description: A miniature sink painted with crisp, cool strokes of porcelain white and pale blue-gray, its glossy surface reflecting the natural light with sharp, dancing highlights. Subtle shadows of lavender and soft gray define the basin's curves, suggesting pristine cleanliness.

enhanced_objects.name: orange tree
enhanced_objects.artistic_description: A toy orange tree rendered with dappled strokes of vibrant emerald and sage green for the foliage, dotted with small spheres of bright tangerine and warm amber. The leaves show delicate variations of cool and warm greens, catching light with a soft, matte texture.

enhanced_objects.name: fox
enhanced_objects.artistic_description: A toy fox painted with rich, warm strokes of russet and deep amber, its fur suggested by quick, textured dabs of burnt orange and soft gold. The glossy plastic eyes catch bright highlights, while the muzzle shows gentle transitions of cream and pale peach.

enhanced_objects.name: banana
enhanced_objects.artistic_description: A toy banana rendered with bold, curved strokes of bright yellow and soft chartreuse, its smooth surface showing gentle gradients of warm gold where light hits most directly. Subtle brown spots suggested with quick dabs of burnt umber add naturalistic detail to the glossy plastic form.

environment_details.scene_brief: A artistic composition featuring pumpkin centered around pumpkin, with toy couch, toy tennis racket, toy vase, toy sink, toy orange tree, toy fox, and toy banana

lighting.reasoning: Soft, natural side-lighting from a window (implied by the afternoon time) would provide gentle modeling on the three-dimensional toys and pumpkin, creating the subtle color variations and atmospheric effects characteristic of Impressionism. The warm mood complements the playful, domestic subject matter.

final_prompts.main_prompt: A Impressionism painting depicting a bright and active yet gentle afternoon scene with natural soft lighting. In the foreground, a large pristine toy couch in dusty rose and cream sits prominently. On the couch, a dominant fresh pumpkin with warm ochre and burnt sienna tones rests, positioned beside a medium unused toy tennis racket featuring glossy white and honey brown. Next to the racket, a small empty cerulean and teal vase is placed. Behind the couch, a medium spotless porcelain white sink with pale blue-gray accents is visible. Behind the sink, a large artificial orange tree with emerald green foliage and tangerine plastic fruit stands tall. Beside the couch, a medium playful toy fox figure with russet and burnt orange fur sits. Finally, a small synthetic bright yellow and chartreuse banana rests on top of the sink.
final_prompts.negative_prompt: photorealistic, 3d render, modern, digital art, photograph, low quality, blurry, distorted
